title: How to Make an Origami Pig

steps.title: Start off with a square piece of paper.
steps.content: Start off with a square piece of paper.

steps.title: Fold the top and bottom to the center line.
steps.content: Fold the top and bottom to the center line.

steps.title: Fold all four corners to the center line.
steps.content: Fold all four corners to the center line.

steps.title: Reverse the corner folds you've just made to crease, then return to the original fold.
steps.content: Reverse the corner folds you've just made to crease, then return to the original fold.

steps.title: Fold the 2 triangular ends toward the center (you'll end up with a rectangle) to crease, then unfold.
steps.content: Fold the 2 triangular ends toward the center (you'll end up with a rectangle) to crease, then unfold.

steps.title: Repeat for the other three corners.
steps.content: Repeat for the other three corners.

steps.title: Fold the model in half vertically with the triangles on the outside.
steps.content: Fold the model in half vertically with the triangles on the outside.

steps.title: Fold the inside of the triangle in half so it points down to create the feet.
steps.content: Fold the inside of the triangle in half so it points down to create the feet.

steps.title: Repeat for all four triangles, front and back.
steps.content: Repeat for all four triangles, front and back.

steps.title: Fold the left triangular end on itself (to the edge of the foot) and unfold.
steps.content: Fold the left triangular end on itself (to the edge of the foot) and unfold.

steps.title: Then open it up and turn your last fold inside out.
steps.content: Then open it up and turn your last fold inside out.

steps.title: Get the point from inside this fold and fold it back out again.
steps.content: Get the point from inside this fold and fold it back out again.

steps.title: Fold the point at the other end, not to the edge but slightly above it.
steps.content: Fold the point at the other end, not to the edge but slightly above it.

steps.title: Unfold, open it out, and then reverse the crease.
steps.content: Unfold, open it out, and then reverse the crease.

steps.title: Stand the pig up.
steps.content: Stand the pig up. All done.
